SELECT op_r.id, op_r.remote_addr, op_r.params, op_r.method, op_r.create_time, op_r.is_success, IFNULL(u.username, '未知') AS username, IFNULL( p.`name`, op_r.request_url ) AS permName FROM t_operate_record AS op_r LEFT JOIN t_user AS u ON op_r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_perms AS p ON op_r.request_url = p.url WHERE (1 = 1)
AND (op_r.request_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyWord},'%') OR op_r.remote_addr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyWord},'%') OR op_r.method LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyWord},'%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyWord},'%'))
ORDER BY op_r.create_time DESC

SELECT rec.method, COUNT(*) AS total, '1' AS type FROM `t_operate_record` AS rec GROUP BY rec.method UNION ALL SELECT u.username AS method, COUNT(*) AS total, '2' AS type FROM t_operate_record AS rec1 INNER JOIN t_user u ON rec1.user_id = u.id GROUP BY u.username UNION ALL SELECT '未知' AS method, COUNT(*) AS total, '2' AS type FROM t_operate_record AS rec2 WHERE rec2.user_id IS NULL OR rec2.user_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM t_user)
